attribute.name.spellbladenext.convertfro: Fire Power gained as Attack Damage
Frost Power gained as Attack Damage
Arcane Power gained as Attack Damage
attribute.name.spellbladenext.converttof: Attack Damage gained as Fire Power
Attack Damage gained as Frost Power
attribute.name.spellbladenext.converttoa: Attack Damage gained as Arcane Power
attribute.name.spellbladenext.converttoh: Attack Damage gained as Healing Power
attribute.name.spellbladenext.purpose: of Non-Healing Spell Power gained as Healing Power
spellbladenext.spellbladetext: Upon casting a spell with this Spellblade, you gain Strength and Haste equal to a quarter of your power relating to the spell's school, for up to however long the cooldown of the spell is.
item.spellbladenext.thesis_spell_book.de: Fear not the mage who has cast a thousand different spells once, fear the mage who has cast a single spell a thousand times.
Awaken your spell at a spell binding table.
item.spellbladenext.tabula_rasa.desc: If you wish to be reborn, empty is the best way to be.
item.spellbladenext.tabula_rasa.desc2: Apply up to six Spell Oils onto this item.
item.spellbladenext.spelloil.desc1: Binds the spell to an item that can cast spells, but does not already have a spell bound.
item.spellbladenext.spelloil.desc2: Drag to an item and right click to apply. IRREVERSIBLE. See Spell Engine Keybind 1 if used incorrrectly.
spell.spellbladenext.thesis.name: Awakened
spell.spellbladenext.thesis.description: You have dedicated your life to the casting of one particular spell. You have 50%% more spell power and spell haste.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.name: Rending Winds
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.descr: Spin up a gust of wind, dealing heavy knockback and {damage} physical damage (can crit) per second to the target enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyslam.name: Grand Vault
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyslam.descript: Leap into the clouds, becoming invulnerable while channeling.
spell.spellbladenext.reckoning.name: Monkey King's Reckoning
spell.spellbladenext.reckoning.descripti: Spin, dealing {damage} physical damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.combustion.name: Phoenix Curse
spell.spellbladenext.combustion.descript: Passive: On a cooldown, Your damage sets enemies on fire for 2 seconds and gives them Phoenix's Curse for the same duration, preventing fires on them from going out and dealing {damage} fire spell damage 4 times over 2 seconds. Active: Deal {damage} fire spell damage to nearby enemies.
spell.spellbladenext.phoenixdive.name: Phoenix Dive
spell.spellbladenext.phoenixdive.descrip: Blink towards the target direction, performing a nova for {damage} fire damage upon landing and setting hit enemies on fire.
spell.spellbladenext.snuffout.name: Wildfire
spell.spellbladenext.snuffout.descriptio: The flames around you blaze into an inferno, causing enemies that are on fire to deal {damage} fire damage to enemies around them, extinguishing them
spell.spellbladenext.sniper.name: Runeblaze Round
spell.spellbladenext.sniper.description: Charge and shoot your rifle, dealing 2x ranged damage and an additional {damage} ranged physical damage.
spell.spellbladenext.overblaze.name: Incinerating Round
spell.spellbladenext.overblaze.descripti: Incinerate enemies in a line, dealing {damage} spell damage.
spell.spellbladenext.riflebarrage.name: Scrap Barrage
spell.spellbladenext.riflebarrage.descri: Shoot repeatedly while channeling, dealing up to 1x ranged damage plus an additional {damage} spell damage per shot to enemies in a cone, based on proximity.
spell.spellbladenext.eldritchblast.name: Reverberating Ray
spell.spellbladenext.eldritchblast.descr: Fire a blast in the target direction, dealing {damage} arcane damage to all enemies in a line. Expends all stacks of Unleash to repeat, once per stack.
spell.spellbladenext.echoes.name: Runic Echoes
spell.spellbladenext.echoes.description: Passive: You gain 1 stack of Unleash every 4 seconds. Active: Damage an enemy whose last melee hit taken was from you, dealing {damage} arcane damage. Normally cannot target an enemy more than once, unless you spend an unleash stack to do so.
spell.spellbladenext.bladestorm.name: Echostorm
spell.spellbladenext.bladestorm.descript: Conjure a reverberating vortex, which homes into your target if you selected one, dealing {damage} arcane damage every half second. Goes on cooldown for 8 seconds unless you have an Unleash stack to spend.
spell.spellbladenext.flameslash.name: Flaming Laceration
spell.spellbladenext.flameslash.descript: {damage} Fire DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting flaming, exploding projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.frostslash.name: Blade Flurry
spell.spellbladenext.frostslash.descript: {damage} Frost DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting bouncing, ricocheting blade projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.amethystslash.name: Amethyst Splash
spell.spellbladenext.amethystslash.descr: {damage} Arcane DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting piercing amethyst projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneoverdrive.des: {damage} Arcane damage in an area around you. Activates normally and on hit.
spell.spellbladenext.frostoverdrive.name: Frost Overdrive
spell.spellbladenext.frostoverdrive.desc: {damage} Frost damage in an area around you. Activates normally and on hit.
spell.spellbladenext.fireoverdrive.name: Flame Overdrive
spell.spellbladenext.fireoverdrive.descr: {damage} Fire damage in an area around you. Activates normally and on hit.
spell.spellbladenext.finalstrike.name: Sonic Strike
spell.spellbladenext.finalstrike.descrip: Charge up a deadly attack against all enemies in a line, teleporting behind the last one and dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} arcane spell damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 arcane power.
spell.spellbladenext.eviscerate.name: Massacre
spell.spellbladenext.eviscerate.descript: Become intangible, attacking the nearest enemy five times over a second, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage. If this kills the enemy before the last hit, these effects continue onto another enemy. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 frost power.
spell.spellbladenext.whirlingblades.name: Riptide
spell.spellbladenext.whirlingblades.desc: Aim and launch yourself as if with a riptide-enchanted trident
spell.spellbladenext.flicker_strike.name: Flickering Flame
spell.spellbladenext.flicker_strike.desc: Jump onto nearby enemies equally, dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} fire damage. Focuses on one target if there is only one target. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 fire power.
spell.spellbladenext.frostblink.name: Arcane Flicker
spell.spellbladenext.frostblink.descript: Teleport behind an enemy, dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.coldbuff.name: Ice King's Curse
spell.spellbladenext.coldbuff.descriptio: If you have Frost Power IV+, unfreeze yourself, inflict 150%% freeze on nearby enemies, gaining Strength V for 8 seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.frostbloom0.name: Frost Lotus
spell.spellbladenext.frostbloom0.descrip: Perform a nova around you dealing {damage} damage, chilling enemies hit, gaining one stack of Frost Power, up to 4. Increases in area per Frost Power. Chills you on use.
spell.spellbladenext.deathchill.name: Deathchill
spell.spellbladenext.deathchill.descript: Passive: You chill faster and heat up slower. Your damage saps the heat from enemies, inflicting chill on them. Active: Rapidly chill yourself, gaining up to Resistance III the longer you channel.
spell.spellbladenext.frostvert.name: Dragon Slam
spell.spellbladenext.frostvert.descripti: Perform a fiery slam, first launching yourself into the air if already airborne. Deals {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} fire damage in an area. You can land safely while performing this move.
spell.spellbladenext.smite.name: Divine Smite
spell.spellbladenext.smite.description: Smite enemies in front of you in an area, dealing {damage_1} physical and {damage_2} extra healing damage to each enemy hit, 50%% more healing damage against undead. Gives you the Spellblade passive upon use.
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.descripti: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} arcane damage per second. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 arcane power.
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.name: Inferno
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.description: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} fire damage per second. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 fire power.
spell.spellbladenext.tempest.name: Tempest
spell.spellbladenext.tempest.description: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage per second. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 frost power
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.name: Cyclone
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.descripti: Spin continuously, {damage} physical damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneflourish.name: Arcane Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneflourish.desc: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} arcane damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 arcane power.
spell.spellbladenext.fireflourish.name: Fire Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.fireflourish.descri: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} fire damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 fire power.
spell.spellbladenext.frostflourish.name: Frost Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.frostflourish.descr: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} frost damage. Gain 1 Haste and Strength per 4 frost power.
